sourcesContent:
<template>
    <Layout>
        <el-main>
            <el-card style=" margin-bottom: 10px" >
                <el-tabs v-model="activeTab">
                    <el-tab-pane label="选课规划" name="schedule" class="classtype">
                      <keep-alive>
                        <XuanKe v-if="activeTab === 'schedule'"></XuanKe>
                      </keep-alive>
                    </el-tab-pane>
                    <el-tab-pane label="方案管理" name="class" class="classtype">
                      <keep-alive>
                        <Workshop v-if="activeTab === 'class'"></Workshop>
                      </keep-alive>
                    </el-tab-pane>
                  </el-tabs>
            </el-card>
          </el-main>

        
    </Layout>
</template>

<script>
import Layout from '@/components/Layout.vue'
import XuanKe from './XuanKe.vue';
import request from "@/utils/request";

export default {
  name: 'thomas',
  components: {
      Layout,
        XuanKe,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      activeTab: 'schedule', // 默认激活的选项卡
    }
  },
  methods: {
  }
}
</script>
